name: sistema-planillas
description: Sistema de planillas con Node.js, Express y Airtable

scripts.verify-frontend: ls && [ -d frontend ] && echo 'Frontend exists' || (echo 'Frontend is empty, copying content' && cp -r ../frontend-backup frontend) && ls frontend
scripts.clean: npm cache clean --force && cd frontend && npm cache clean --force && cd ..
scripts.install-all: npm ci && cd frontend && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run verify-versions && npm run verify-frontend && npm run install-all && npm run verify-permissions && npm run build-frontend
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
